name: That Lonely Spaceship
description:
Bullet Hell type of game, control your spaceship and avoid all lightnings strikes.

You ended up stuck in space thunderstorm. Survive!

If choosing difficulty doesn't work, try refreshing page and not going into fullscreen.

This game was made for "Sleepless Inc. Jam #2 (Return of the Squids)" it was my ninth Game Jam. The theme was "Lightning".

Everything in the game is created by me in limit of 50 hours.

Reviews and suggestions are welcomed!

By: RabbitDev
